name: grp13-container-export
label: GRP-13: De-identified/Anonymized File Export - Container
description: Created by the gear builder. Edit the manifest file to give this gear a description!

deid_template.description: A Flywheel de-identification template specifying the de-identification actions to perform on input_file

project_path.description: The resolver path of the destination project, for example, flywheel/test

file_type.description: the type of files to de-identify/anonymize and export

overwrite_files.description: If true, existing files in destination containers will be overwritten if a file to  be exported shares their filename

author: Kaleb Fischer
